title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg-cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.
